subject: Track and Field
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: A Russian doping scandal took a new twist when the French newspaper Le Monde reported that Lamine Diack, a former president of the International Association of Athletics Federations, had asked the leader of the Russian track federation for more than $1 million to finance the political opposition in his native Senegal.
